# Your definitions here.
# They will be imported in the module 'user'.

from random import random

def dist(v1, v2):
	return 600*(v1-v2)**2

def field(i,j, n_seeds):
	seeds = np.array([(15*random(), 15*random()) for i in range(n_seeds)])
	res =  dist(i, seeds[0,0])+ dist(j, seeds[0,1])
	for k in range(1, n_seeds):
		res = np.minimum(res, dist(i, seeds[k,0])+ dist(j, seeds[k,1]))
	return res
